data: Kill the hunter and escape from the ward
Gain access to the Greenhouse section
Destroy the bricked up doorway to gain access to the tower
Bring proof of the dress-wearing hunter's death to the Guard Room
Kill the monkey and bring his body to the Guard Room
He's gonna get away with my damned shoes! Close the door!
Stay boy, stay boy. Close that gate!
Close the gate and stop that wriggly witchetty man!
Fug see liddle man! Close door! Close door!
Da door - shud id! Shud id!
Don't let that philandering scumball out of here! Close the gate!
Oh no, you're not leaving this house to see her! Girls, lock that door!
Oh you worthless, stupid, drunk! Lock that door!
Time to play? Time to play! Fug coming!
Oohh. Time for Fug to play doctor!
Doctor Fug make it all better, aaalll better...
Don't worry, Fug stob da pain. Fug stob da paaiin.
Who dat? Fug not playing this game...
Big bonez! Open the door! Bonez!
I can't see Mr. Witchetty! Open the door!
Where's nasty wriggly Mr. Witchetty? Open the door!
He hide from Fug! Open door!
Open door so Fug can go and see!
Fug can't see funny man - Open door! Open door!
He's sloped off to see that whore again! Open the door, kids!
Barry? Barry! Where is that shit? Open the door!
Barry? Barry! Where is that shit? Open the door!
The lunatics have taken over the asylum, Cash!
The only way to reason with these gibbering idiots is with a stick and a gun!
I want you to kill the hunter patrolling the tower walkway and bring his body to the Guard Room.
There's a good boy. Now drop all your weapons and move on.
For bringing his head, I'll leave a gift for you in the next location.
There are some more of these paranoid crazies guarding the door to the greenhouses.
They see you and I guarantee they'll lock that door!
When they feel safe they'll probably unlock the door again. They like their routine.
There's a hunter in the next room, through the mesh door.
Hack him up and I'll buzz open the next set of doors for you!
That's the ticket! I've opened the doors, run along, now!
Some of these nut jobs have bricked themselves into the tower!
You'll have to find a way to blast your way in!
Another switch! Go on, throw it and see what happens, go on you can trust me...
There, that wasn't anything to worry about, was it?
...the Senator also visited the Darkwoods Penitentiary
which hosts more than a thousand inmates from all over the country...
The prison's modern facilities include spacious cells for the inmates
...the exceptionally well staffed hospital is equipped for emergencies as well as routine health checks...
...adjacent to ROW 1, the electric chair room is where death sentences are carried out...
DIRECTOR: Eliminate this hunter and I will open the door for you, make it nice and messy.
DIRECTOR: Excellent, I have now unlocked the doors at the far end of the ward.
DIRECTOR: Cash I want you to kill this hunter in the dress and bring evidence of his death to the Guard Room.
DIRECTOR: Cash, you will need to find a way of destroying the bricked up door to get inside the tower.
DIRECTOR: Well done Cash,now on to the next area.
DIRECTOR: Cash for bringing his head here I will leave a gift in the next level.
DIRECTOR: Cash you will need to past these guards to enter the Greenhouses, if you are spotted they will lock the door.
DIRECTOR: When spotted use the shadows to hide. When they can't find you, they will unlock the door.
DIRECTOR: Cash, kill the monkey and bring his body to the guard room.
DIRECTOR: Cash for bringing his head here I will leave a gift in the next level, but I need you to bring his body.
DIRECTOR: Cash, I want you to drop all your weapons and put on the monkey outfit.
HUNTER: I see him, I see him, Close the door!
HUNTER: Shit I can't see him, open the door.
WARDHUNTER: Shut the fuck up!, don't make me come through there!
WARDHUNTER: Damn machine! why do I have to turn it off, I should get a remote or something.
GUY IN CHAIR: ARRGGG THE PAIN!!!!
WARDHUNTER: Shut up I am not playing this game...
VOICES SCREAMING: Man down, I need backup here! ARGH!!!!!
CERBERUS: What the hell was THAT?
CERBERUS2: Who's got the fucking remote control?!?
RADIO: A kill team is en route to your position.
CERBERUS: Shoot targets on sight!, Starkweather want's them both dead.
CERBERUS: No sign of either target, they won't get through this way!
CERBERUS : Ah these guys have been slaughtered, What the fuck did this?
You must find the side entrance to the mansion cellar
What the-? Back up! I need immediate backupaarrgghh!
Holy fuck! Gimme some help here-aarrgghh!
Eerr, control, I'm gonna need some backup here! Control? Aarrgghh!
Who's got the fucking remote for the door?!?
Somebody get this damned door open!
Ok, who's got the remote - we gotta open this door!
He's locked himself in the garage!
A team is en route to your position, over.
We're sending a backup team, over.
Hang in there, backup is on its way.
Bring 'em down! Starkweather wants 'em both dead.
Shoot to kill, repeat, shoot to kill - Both targets!
No sign of either target, they won't get through this way!
I got my sector covered - nobody's coming through this way!
The angel of death is home and awaiting visitors!
Hold on - this door was open a moment ago!
Hey wait a minute, wasn't this open?
...but Mr. Starkweather refuses to comment on these allegations.
At this point it is unclear as to whether or not he will ever be allowed to direct again.
You know what? I don't give a fuck what Starkweather wants.
Maybe today I kill you, maybe not.
What was that? Go check it out.
Shit, what the fuck is THAT?
Keep an eye on him for a minute.
Your Hard Drive does not have enough free space to save games. Press any key to continue without saving.
This slot already contains a previously saved game. Do you want to overwrite this saved game? Enter to overwrite Esc to cancel.
Unknown Error while saving. Unable to save Manhunt data. Press any key to continue.
Unable to load Manhunt data. Data may be unusable. Press any key to continue.

Headset detected. The headset allows you to generate noise within the game using your voice. The reactions of the hunters will vary according to how loud you speak. The microphone and earpiece volumes can be adjusted in the SETTINGS page of the front-end. Press any key to continue.
ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO RESTORE ALL SETTINGS TO THE DEFAULT?
ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT THE PROGRAM?
AND MAKE SURE THAT THE BOX
ON THE LEFT IS JUST VISIBLE.
TO BEST EXPERIENCE MANHUNT YOU SHOULD...
No Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) Detected in slot One.
Do not remove the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) or switch off the PS2

Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) is not inserted in MEMORY CARD slot 1. You may insert a valid Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 or press the ~cross~ button to proceed without a Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2). Manhunt needs at least 120 KB free space (recommended 600 KB)
No game file exists on Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1. Press the ~cross~ button to create a game file or press the ~triangle~ button to proceed without saving.
Confirm Save? Press the ~cross~ button to save or press the ~triangle~ button to cancel.
No Manhunt disc found in disc tray. Please insert your Manhunt disc.
Disc tray is Open, please insert your Manhunt disc into the tray and close it.
Cheat mode active - Save function disabled.
Data may be corrupted if during a save the console is turned off, or reset, or if the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) or controller is removed. Press ~triangle~ button to continue.

No Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) inserted in MEMORY CARD slot 1. Insertion of a Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) beyond this point may cause data to be overwritten. Press ~triangle~ button to continue.
Saving data. Do not remove the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2), controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 has changed. Continue Saving on new Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2)?
Data cannot be saved because a Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) is not inserted. The Game will Continue without saving!.
Do you wish to Save ?~triangle~ YES~square~NO
Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) Error While Saving

Manhunt only allows one in-progress save per slot. If you continue with this in-progress save you will overwrite your previous in-progress save. ~cross~ button to overwrite ~triangle~ button to cancel.
Checking game data. Do not remove the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 or reset/switch off the console.
Formatting Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD Slot 1. Do not remove the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) or the controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Format failed! Please check Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 and try again. Press the ~cross~ button to continue.

Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 is unformatted. Press the ~square~ button to format the Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) or press the ~triangle~ button to proceed without being able to save.
Memory Card (8MB) (for PlayStation~(R)~2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1 is unformatted. Press ~cross~ button to continue.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Please insert a DUALSHOCK~(R)~ analog controller or DUALSHOCK~(R)~2 analog controller in controller port 1 to continue.
No supported controller inserted in controller port 1. Please insert a DUALSHOCK~(R)~ analog controller or DUALSHOCK~(R)~2 analog controller in controller port 1 to continue.

To make the Tramp follow you, press the Use button when you are facing him and he is waiting.
To make the Tramp stop and wait for you, press the Use button when you are facing him and he is following you.
Hunters will attack the tramp, so make sure they don't find him. He can hide in the shadows if you guide him there.
The tramp's health bar and arrow on the radar will go blue when he is hidden in a safe zone.
Rescue the tramp from his cell
Take the tramp past the streets to the graveyard
Find a shotgun then take the tramp to the old tomb
How did we end up on this shit post?
Should be getting high with the guys guarding the derelict house.
Stop whining, this is what we do.
Fuck this guarding shit! Why only the others have to get all the fun?
This sucks. Kinda like your sister.
Stop it! You're making me mad!
Apparently a bum is gonna show up 'round here and we've got to do him. Poor bastard.
It's one thing to wax some psycho... but I aint into killing no bum.
I saw that tramp before. Trust me - if he gets close, we'll smell him.
I killed a bum once in ... It was no big deal.
Oh que pasa, you don't have the stomach for this?
Ohhhhhh I think I can smell him already!
Anything for my new bestest buddy!
We going to get some liquor?
What the hell, this looks comfortable enough!
Bring back something to drink, would ya!
No need to be so bossy - I was thinking of hanging around here anyway!
Ok, you two be careful now!
Hey, you better come back for me, buddy...
You got a couple of dollars, huh? Huh?
You better have something to drink, pal.
Stay close - make a sound an' I'll kill you myself.
Stay here an' don't move a fuckin' muscle.
I've got a little surprise for you. You looked lonely, so I got you some company.
Unfortunately the Innocentz thought better of it and locked him up.
You're gonna have to bust him out!
Well what do you think of your new friend? You look good together, Cash, really you do.
I'll only open any gates if he's with you, alive and well.
You're going to have to think of a way of separating these guys and picking them off one by one�
I told you. Get that hobo safely to the gate and I'll buzz you through.
I thought this graveyard would make a great location for a shoot-out - what do you think, Cash?
Aw, Cash, I'm disappointed, really I am,
is that any way to care for your bestest buddy?!
Cash! You let that poor man down in the biggest possible way.
I only hope you can live with yourself.
You blew it Cash! All you had to do was look out for someone for ten minutes and you blew it...
Cash, baby, you let them kill your friend
and you made such a lovely couple!
See that old house? That's where you're headed.
You're doing good Cash, you'll need to go through the pedestrian tunnel - find it.
Hey, what about your new buddy - you're not going to abandon him are you?
You've left your new chum behind - friends are supposed to look out for each other!
Is that how you treat your pals? Leave 'em to rot?
Cash! Your buddy's getting the crap kicked out of him!
You've got to learn how to care for others, Cash - Your new friend's in trouble!
Heads up, Cash, you better go rescue your new friend!
Oh dear, looks like your new bunk buddy's run into a few Hunters!
You know the deal, Cash. I open the door when I see your friend.
When I see your smelly friend I'll open the door.
I'm not blind Cash, where's your hobo buddy?
The tramp! Where's the fucking tramp, Cash?
The Exit is behind this old tomb. You'll need a shotgun
so make sure to pick one up along the way.
Director : Nice work Cash!, Alright take him out through the alley, only he can open the doors, so if he dies so do you. You need to get him to the graveyard.
Director : See this, That's a tramp gate, you gotta have the man if you wanna pass through.
Director : The tramps locked up behind that door, take out the guard.
Hunter : How did we end up on this shit post, should be getting high with the guys at the derelict house.
Director : The tramp got killed, do it again.
Director : The tramp is under attack, if he dies you'll have to start again.
Director : Aren't you missing someone, go back and get the tramp.
Director : The door won't be opened til I see that tramp.
Director : I'm not stupid Cash, Go back and get the tramp, then I'll open the gate.
Director : I'm not blind Cash, wheres the tramp?.
Director : When I see the tramp, I'll open the door.
(TRAMP SINGING) Guard : Shut up in there
Take the Journalist to her apartment. When you are close, press the Use button to make her wait or follow.
Do not leave her too far behind, or she will get scared and will run to you!
The doors of this police van can be opened with a crowbar. If you have one, face them and press the Use button.
The journalist is freaking out! You have 20 seconds to go back to her or she will come looking for you!
You need the journalist to open this door.
Be careful to hide dead bodies. Cops will shoot on sight if they see a dead police officer.
You have left the Journalist behind again!
Take the Journalist to her apartment and recover the dossier
Break out of the perimeter created by the Police and reach the SUBWAY
There's that reporter bitch! Hey you, don't move another inch!
Hey, lady! Stay where you are!
Hey you! You're wanted for questioning!
Aww, what now? I'll check it out.
What the hell is going on here??
Someone is playing games with us. Let's check it out..
What is up with that thing?
Dispatch, we have a man down! Fugitive is armed !
Dispatch, subject located, he is armed and dangerous!
Hey, reporter lady, we want to talk to you!
Man down! Man down! Fugitive is to be considered highly dangerous!
Dispatch, I've located the fugitive! He's A&D!
Hey, what's up? Talk to me, buddy, you're making me nervous!
Come on, lets flush that bastard out!
We better go see what's going on.
Let's not get left out of all the fun.
Shit. Shit. Shit. We got plenty big trouble!
This is dispatch. Seal the perimeter. Snipers have been ordered to move in.
Officer down! Target has entered the casino!
Man down! Man down! Target is approaching the casino!
Sniper one please report your position...
Hey, I thought we were sticking together!
Hey where are you going! Don't you want the dossier?!?
Take the dossier, for christ's sake!
You gonna leave the dossier? Take it!
My place is upstairs. Here, I got the keys.
My place is up a floor. Hold on, I'll just unlock the door...
I'll get the door. My place's just up some stairs.
Great, a gun� looks straight forward enough.
Ok, I've used a pistol before. Now where's the safety?
Alright, a gun! None of those freaks are gonna fuck with me now!
These babies should numb the pain.
I'm not usually a 'pill popper' but given the circumstances...
Ok, if you think it's safe�
Ok, but you gotta watch out for me!
You got it - I'll stay close!
I'm with you - lead the way.
Ok, just dont leave me behind!
You come back for me, ok!
If you hear me scream, you better come back for me, ok?
Ok, but you better not bug out on me!
I told you not to leave me alone!
Were you ever going to come back for me?
Don't leave me alone for that long again!
Thank God - I thought you'd just dumped me here!
I thought you were never coming back!
At last! Where have you been?
Stick close and keep it quiet.
Lay low here for a while.
Hold tight, I'll be right back.
Everything I need is in that box under the table.
Good, take it and get out of town.
But... You're not coming with me!
I'm going to deal with Starkweather personally,
You're my backup if I don't make it. Have a nice life.
Oh shut up! Get some of your boys to take care of it.
Don't file the arrest report. Don't kill him either. Send both to me.
Hey, remember who you're talking to, you son of a...
Listen you fuck. It's your job to clean up this city's mess.
That's what you get paid for.
But it's another block or two to my apartment!
Just shut up and stick with me if you want to stay alive.
Come on, let's get that dossier.
Hey wait! We still have to get the dossier!
That is the stuff you wanted. Now leave.
My apartment is upstairs. I have to open this door first.
These painkillers will make me fell a bit better.
SHIT. SHIT. SHIT. THIS MEANS TROUBLE, MAN!
THIS IS DISPATCH. SEAL THE PERIMETER. SNIPERS HAVE BEEN ORDERED TO MOVE IN.
Come on, let's flush him out.
MAN DOWN! MAN DOWN! TARGET IS INSIDE THE CASINO!
MAN DOWN! MAN DOWN! TARGET IS APPROACHING THE CASINO!
To execute, sneak behind the hunter and press the Action button
Kill all the hunters to open the chute door
Find a way into the mall
Run away when facing multiple hunters
Press the Run button to sprint
Execute the hunter with the plastic bag
Hide in the shadows next to the gate
Wait until the hunter is facing away, then execute him
Hide in the shadows to lose hunters
Beat up the hunter using your fists
Press the Action button for a quick attack
Press the Action2 button for a hard attack
Find a way to the car park
You can attract hunters by hitting a wall
To peek press the Peek Right or the Peek Left button
Use the keyboard to control the player and the mouse to rotate the camera. Hold the Sneak button to move quietly.
Hold the Run button to sprint. You have limited Stamina, as shown on the flashing ~yellow~yellow ~colour~bar so use it sparingly.
Watch your noise. Sneaking is totally silent, but hunters can hear you running. The ~red~red ~colour~pulse on the radar indicates your noise level.
Watch your noise. Sneaking is totally silent, but hunters can hear you running.
Walk over items to pick them up.
Items are color-coded according to their type. Small improvised weapons, like the Glass Shard are ~green~Green~colour~.
Items are color-coded according to their type. The bag can be used to suffocate hunters.
Only ~green~Green ~colour~weapons, like the Glass Shard, allow you to execute in complete silence.
The radar shows you the location of the hunters. Hunters are displayed whenever they are visible or making noise. The arrow shows the direction they are facing.
The color of the arrow indicates the level of the hunter's awareness, ~red~red ~colour~is aware, ~orange~orange ~colour~is suspicious, ~yellow~yellow ~colour~is idle.
To execute the hunter, sneak up behind him and press either the Action or the Action2 button. When you are ready to execute, the player's stance will change.

To execute the hunter, go back and collect the plastic bag, then sneak up behind the hunter and press either the Action or the Action2 button. When you are ready to execute, the player's stance will change.
The longer you hold down either the Action or the Action2 button, the more vicious the execution.
~green~Green ~colour~weapons like the Plastic Bag can only execute one hunter and are lost after use.
Hide in the shadows over there. Hunters will not see you in the dark unless they are actively searching for you.
Here comes a hunter. Wait until he is facing away from you, then attack.
Your Status Icon goes ~blue~blue ~colour~when you are safely hidden in the shadows.
If you are seen entering the shadows you won't be able to hide there.
The icon will flash ~red~red ~colour~when you are in danger or have been spotted.
These are painkillers. Each bottle replenishes 50% of your health, shown on the flashing ~green~green ~colour~bar.
When facing a hunter, press the Action button to perform a quick attack.
Use the Action2 button to perform a hard attack.
To block an attack do not press any button. Move backwards using the keyboard to back off from combat.
This is a SAVE POINT. Walk over it to activate it. If you die you will start from here.
You can save your progress by selecting save in the Pause menu.
You can review the director's objectives on the Pause screen by pressing the Pause button.
Watch out for patrolling hunters around corners. You can peek out by pressing the Peek Left and Peek Right buttons.
Sprinting creates noise which will attract hunters, this is represented on the radar by the ~red~red ~colur~circle.
Be quick to finish off a hunter before his friends are alerted. Run away when facing multiple hunters, or they will overpower you.
You can lure a hunter by hitting any wall. See that he heard the sound by checking his arrow on the radar. Use this to split up large groups.
You can lure a hunter by hitting any wall. Use this to split up large groups.
You must have a weapon to execute a hunter.
Hunters on different floors from yours are displayed as small triangles on the radar.
Kill that hunter to open this door.
When hunters are executed they will make a noise which may attract other hunters in the area.
You have been spotted! Fight or run.
Be careful when you execute enemies, other hunters can hear the noise if they are too close.
The Chute door is now open.
Kill those two hunters to open this gate.
Kill the remaining hunter to open this gate.

Getting close, my friend, we are getting close. Just pull another little stunt to get rid of the guy over there and we should be done with this location. See that door? It'll take you out of this dump.

Alright Cash, let's work together on this and we will both get through to the happy ending. Remember, I am on your side, I'll try to help you out as much as I can. (short pause) Ok, ready? Camera... Action!

Excellent! that bit with the glass shard was hot stuff, no wonder you were given the chair. Well. here's where your fighting skills get into the picture. Just give me the best you've got and you'll get out in one piece! the gate will open once we are done filming here.
Be vigilant Cash, I see a few Hoods around these vans. Try reaching the abandoned shops upstairs, the way out is right there. Oh, and I want more cut-throat action. I need a few close-up shots.
These streets are being patrolled by gangs. They're scum, just like you
and they're here to hunt you down and cut you up.
I'll try to direct you as best I can but other than that you're on your own - It's up to you!
We're filming something very special here tonight and if we work together on this
we both get the big rewards, so get your shit together!
Remember: as far as the world's concerned you're dead already
so don't hold back - it's them or you
Hot damn, that's the spirit! Hot stuff, Cash, no wonder the state wanted shot of you!
I'll be frank with you, we set that chump up to see if you had what it takes to be our leading man!
A little audition, if you will. Heh heh.
From here on in we're gonna need some fighting skills to get through the action. We're talking toe-to-toe.
I know you've got the balls, so just give me the best you've got and you'll deal with this pussy
no problem. The gate will open once I'm done filming here.
Now take your time, Cash, I see a few Hoods around these vans. Sorry, I should explain.
Each gang has their... Let's just call it their thing.
These guys call themselves 'The Hoods', but none of that should bother you.
As far as you're concerned, they're meat. Ok, on you go...
Try reaching the abandoned shops up on the next floor, the stair is right over there.
Oh, and give me some more of that cut-throat psycho action you illustrated so beautifully earlier.
We're talking the 'money shot', you with me?
Ok, there are some more of these shitheads hanging around the exit.
Give me some grade-A honest-to-god gore and you'll be buzzed through the door.
One of the little freaks is still running around. I told you, you get buzzed through the door when the action's in the can.
It's a WRAP!! Attaboy Cash, you're a natural, I swear to god you are!
No time to hang around � time is money! Let�s see how you handle the next scene�
It looks like this goes all the way to the top.
I can't trust anyone, least of all the police, and time's running out.
I've got to get the one piece of evidence that will expose Starkweather without a shadow of a doubt.
footage and testimony of a man who was executed by the state five hours ago...
I hope you rot IN HELL!!
...has been on deathrow for the past three years and was executed last night.
Hey, tough guy, wake up. You're not dead.
Well, not yet anyway. You're getting a second chance another throw of the dice.
As far as the world is concerned, you died back in the chamber.
Justice was served - James Earl Cash is rotting in Hell.
Hey, hey, get a grip and calm down.
You're probably suffering from shock but I'm here to help.
Pick up the earpiece. Put it on. Go on.
Now only you can hear me and that's the way you're going to want it because I'm your only way out of here.
You've had an unexpected reprieve, do exactly as I say and I promise this will be over before the night is out.
Get the video from that camera.
not by a long fucking way. You gotta trust me
Certain objects can be used to wall-strafe against. Press the Use button when near a wall or object to wall-strafe.
While in wall-strafe mode press the Action2 button to aim over the object or to the side.
This door wont budge, try shooting off the lock.
Go to the basement in the bar.
Get your hands on a gun
Go watch the video on the bar TV
Go to the bar basement and turn on the power
So, how are we doing, Cash? Enjoying it so far?
I thought you could do with a little R&R, so I've arranged a special
It's work in progress, but I think you'll appreciate it.
I've hidden the tape and a video camera in the Mall. Find them.
By the way, these guys are packing heat, so you might want to find a gun for yourself.
Ok, we're cooking with gas now! Go find that tape!
Now all you need is the camera.
Aw hell, that's the camera with the broken screen! I told those guys...
No problem, there's a TV in a bar somewhere around here.
Does nothing fucking work round here?
You're gonna have to see if you can turn on the power in the basement.
Beautifully done, Cash, now just toddle back up to the bar and enjoy the show.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let them go.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let him go.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let her go.
Where were your family when you were facing your final moments in the chamber anyway?
And what gratitude did they show you when you saved them from those gung-ho assholes, eh?
You've left your old life, your old self, behind.
I'm all the family you need now.
You! Get out to the graveyard!
You and you! I want you up there!
And I want you to follow him over to the Mall...
So, how are we doing, Cash? enjoying it so far?
I thought you could do with a little R & R, so I've arranged a special screening just for you.
It's a work in progress, but I think you'll appreciate it.
I've hidden the tape and a video camera in the mall, find them
By the way, these guys are packing heat, so you might want to find a gun yourself, before you venture too far...
Ok, we're cooking with gas now! go and find that tape!
Now all you need is the camera...
Aw hell, that's the camera with the broken screen! I told those guys...
Not a problem, there's a TV in a bar around here someplace
Does nothing fucking work around here?
You're gonna have to see if you can turn the power on in the basement.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let them go.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let him go.
You must understand, Cash, I could never have let her go.
You have collected the ELEVATOR KEY.
The Cerberus Leader has dropped the ~green~ELEVATOR KEY~colour~, go and get it!
You have been spotted by a SECURITY CAMERA - The guards will know your position now.
Watch out for SECURITY CAMERAS. The Cerberus guards use them to know where you are.
The ELEVATOR is now operational again.
You cannot use the elevator yet. You don't have the KEY and the POWER is still off.
You cannot use the elevator yet. You don't have the KEY.
You cannot use the elevator yet. The POWER is still off.
Find the ~green~LEADER~colour~ of the Cerberus team and acquire the ELEVATOR KEY
Reach the ~blue~basement~colour~ in the west wing and turn Starkweather's ELEVATOR back on
Use the ELEVATOR to reach Starkweather
Copy that request for support! Hang in there guys, help is coming!
Roger that! Reinforcements are on their way!
Wilco, should be with you guys ASAP!
Sir, one of the men is not responding. We have to move you somewhere more secure.
I want that asshole's head on a spike, sergeant!
It will be a pleasure, sir! Escort him upstairs.
How did that psycho bastard get past the perimeter guards?
Cash has already neutralised two of our snipers, sir. We should assume he is armed.
Leave two of your best men in the basement, I don't want any more surprises.
Already taken care of, sir. All the men are ready.
I have instructed them to equip themselves from the armoury.
Very well. Any sign of him on the security cameras?
No sir, but if he gets anywhere near that elevator we will be right on him.
Shut the lift down, Starkweather said no unexpected visitors.
Target is armed! Keep him confined!
Target is not armed! Flush him so we can take him out!
I'm coming in there to fuck you up!!!
Nobody gets anywhere near Starkweather. Give me the key.
I want you to go down to the basement and turn off the motor.
We can't be safe with these two bastards running around.
RADIO VOICE: We have reported casualties! Hang tough guys, reinforcements on their way!
GUARD: Shut the lift down, Strarkweather said no unexpected visitors.
GUARD: Sir, One of the men is not responding. We have to take you somewhere more secure.
CHIEF: Order the men to shoot at anything that moves.
GUARD: Consider it done, sir. Escort him upstairs.
CHIEF: How did that bastard get past the perimeter guards?
GUARD: He has killed two of our snipers, sir. We should assume he is armed.
CHIEF: I want his head on a silver plate, seargent!
GUARD: All men are ready, I have instructed them to equip themselves from the armoury.
CHIEF: Very well. Any sign of him in the security cameras?
GUARD: No sir, but if he gets anywhere near that elevator we will be right on him
CHIEF: Leave two of your best men in the basement, I don't want more surprise.
GUARD: This has been already taken care of, sir.
Find a way into the factory complex
Use the lever in the guard hut to open the ~blue~loading bay~colour~ gates
Try to make your way to the factory's front reception area
The lift is out of action. Deactivate the failsafe to power it up again
Get to the reception area and exit the factory anyway you can
The main doors are locked via the control room console
Exit the factory complex and head for the ~blue~loading bay~colour~
Time for a little overtime! Make your way through the factory!
The loading bay's your only way in.
For a job well done make your way to the foyer.
Well that's put a spanner in the works. Why don't you try the guard hut.
Way to go, Cash! Now make your way through the factory.
Aw dammit, the lift's screwed again!
You're going to have to go down to the basement.
There's a circuit breaker down there that will get the lift working.
You need to reset the circuit breaker in the basement for the lift to work!
You need to reset the circuit breaker for the lift to work!
Nice one, Cash. The lift should be working now.
Ok, I admit it - some of the doors are locked via a
panel in the control room - sorry.
That's my leading man! Attaboy! See you with some beers outside!
I told you. You're gonna have to use the panel in the control room to open the door!
I don't think we've made too many friends - Hell, I like you, but these guys...
Director: Not that way! That would be too easy!
Director: Use the control room console to open these doors!
Director: You need to get down to that basement and deactivate the failsafe...
DIrector: It's preventing the gantry lift from working!
Director: You need the failsafe off for the lift to work!
Director: Good! That lift should be working now!
Director: That's it! Those main entrance doors are unlocked! Meet you outside!
Director: Some doors are locked via the main control room of the works!
Director: Well done for now! You haven't seen the last of that rabbit though!
Director: Time for a little overtime! Make your way through this factory!
Director: Use the loading bay as your entry point... If you can!
Director: You'll need to reopen the loading bay gates! Check out the guard hut!
Director: Excellent! Try and work your way through the factory complex...
Director: Get to the foyer and pick up your wages when the job's done!
Director: That control room might be important!
Director: Seems your work isn't up to scratch! This reception committee looks pissed off!
You have picked up the PRISON GATE KEY.
Follow the rabbit by exiting the cellblock
Kill the patrolling hunter and get up to the control room
Kill all the death row hunters
Get to the workshop anyway you can
Activate the sensor lock and chase that rabbit
Kill the ~green~White Rabbit~colour~ to acquire the KEY to the prison's gates
Get to the gates and exit the prison
Darling, I'm coming to get you!
You did well! Very well. But every film has its ending and this here is yours!
You made it! Oh dear, you see, you didn't make it after all! Ha-ha-heee-hooo!
Close your eyes, bad boy! Time for bye-byes!
Hey, you ain't dead! He ain't dead! Oh shit, I've got the keys outta here!
You're supposed to be dead! Aw fuck, he's after my frikkin' key!
Holy frogger! I've got the key - if he gets me he's outta here!
You're my big ugly Alice, so go on, follow the White Rabbit!
They're messing with you, Cash, trying to fuck with your head! I wouldn't stand for that!
You might want to clean the filth out of the showers...
Get rid of the pink dressed freak and get up to the watch room. Mr. Rabbit has left you a gift!
A new meaning for death row! Get yourself up to that watch room!
You're a threshing machine, Cash! Now head for the door below the control room!
Watch those cells closely. Kill 'em all!
Almost there, baby! Chew your way through these chumps!
What can I say? You were a good leading man, the audience will love you.
Don't expect any royalty cheques where you're going though!
Hey, Cash, what are you doing? Are you insane?
Where are you gonna go? The state wants you dead, Cash, dead!
You let Cash slip his leash - bring him to heel!
Failure isn't an option. NOW GO!
Director: Follow the White Rabbit! You're one ugly fuckin' Alice though!
Director: Get rid of that screw and get up to that room. The rabbit has left you a gift!
Director: A new meaning for death row! Get yourself up to that control room!
Director: Fine shooting! Head for the door below the control room!
Director: Watch those cells closely! Pick them all off!
Director: Almost there, get through this last section anyway you can!
Rabbit: You did well! Very well. Every film has an ending and this is yours.
Director: What can I say? You were a good leading man, the audience will love you... don't expect any royalty cheques where you're going though!
White Rabbit: Shit! The punk has survived the final cut! He gets me, he gets out! Get me some backup!
Director: The rabbit is dead! Storm that tower!
Kill ~green~Ramirez~colour~ before he calls in back up!
Dispose of the three stalking hunters
Get into the old apartment block and track down ~green~Ramirez~colour~
Kill ~green~Ramirez~colour~ before he calls in back up
Get out there and bring me his fucking head!
He's making fools of us - get out there and find him!
First man brings me his severed dick gets ten thousand dollars!
Move it, you assholes, he's down there somewhere!
You inept motherfuckers! He's down there - Find him!
He's making fools of you all! Check the shadows!
Put some fucking effort into it!
This isn't a game! Find him!
If you don't find him soon I'll shoot you myself!
I swear I'll kill you all myself if you don't find that motherfucker soon!
He's here somewhere! Just flush him out so I can nail the bastard!
Where do you think you're going, little man? Huh? Huh!
I'll rip your fucking head off!
You like hide and seek? You like hide and fucking seek?
Well we're coming for you, asshole.
Don't you want to play any more?
It's our turn now! Run, RUN!
Get in, you idiot, GET IN!
Who are you - I've seen your face before!
Get offa me! I'm a reporter - I was at your execution!
I've been following Starkweather's little operation for months.
The guy that's been talking you through this whole circus of death!
Look, I've got all I need to expose that sick bastard
But he's definitely onto me now, so I have to get back to my apartment
Collect my material and get out of town before I become another of Starkweather's 'extras'.
You can bring him down, this Starkweather?
Absolutely - this is gonna make my career.
Ramirez: Flush that bitch-ass punk out! I'm da black Lee Harvey Oswald!
Ramirez: He gives you any trouble, slice that punk into food for my bitch!
Ramirez: Bitch! Unlock that bottom door! He gets to me, he really is a bad ass!
Ramirez: How'd he get this far? I gotta do tha job myself!
Kill Piggsy and find a way to reach Starkweather
Take care of the Cerberus guards to enter Starkweather's room
The chainsaw makes noise when its engine is running. Turn it OFF with the Action2 button.
Rraarggh! Piggsy gonna suck your guts!
Piggsy bored. Go home to bed and sleep...
Piggsy not play no more. Piggsy go hoome...
I'm coming in there to fuck you up!!!
Send him to hell! Go on!
Acclaimed movie maker Lionel Starkweather has been found dead today
along with several of his bodyguards, at his estate at the Wapona Hills residential district.
In what investigators are calling a bloody vendetta,
An unknown assailant infiltrated the compound, killing Starkweather,
but more interestingly, leading police to the site of a snuff film ring being run from the estate's confines.
Linked to this ring is Carcer City's own police chief Gary Schaffer,
whose lawyer stated that he intends to plead not guilty.
When using guns, shoot by pressing the Action button.
Press the Action2 button to zoom in on the closest hunter.
When wall-strafing you can aim at hunters around corners by holding the Action2 button.
Press the Reload button to reload your weapon.
Press the Reload button to reload your weapon.
Aim to the head if you can. Headshots do more damage and with firearms they can kill instantly.
You need something sharp to cut this rope.
Kill that hunter to open this gate.
You can detonate these Gas Canisters by shooting them with the nailgun.
This is an ammo pick-up, you must have the desired weapon in your inventory to collect this.
Kill the hunter guarding the gate
Find something to cut the ~blue~rope ~colour~on the gate
Find a way into the trailer to get the nailgun
Find and activate the switch to open the ~blue~gate
Go back to the gate to get to the exit
I can smell it's putrid corruption
G-guys! I... I see him! He's here! Guys!
Holy fuck - th - there he is! Hey he's over here!
Ok, so I lied. We haven't quite wrapped this gig up, but hey
There's a double gate that leads on through to our next location - find it.
Careful, there's a bigot guarding the gate. If he sees you he'll call his cheery buddies...
That's a pretty thick rope - you're gonna need a blade...
You didn't think I'd let you out that easily did you? It's an electric lock
Beautiful! That's his hunting days over!
There's a nailgun in that trailer - if you can stand the smell!
He's got his hands full at the moment - go grab his nailgun...

Spotter : I see him, I see him, calling in back-up.

Hunter : Is that you guys out there?, comon I'm taking a crap in here.
Pick up the gas can with the Use button and take it back to the crane.
To rotate the crane use the keyboard or the mouse. To activate the magnet press the Action button.
You can leave the crane by pressing the Use button.
Be careful as hunters can still shoot you whilst inside the crane.
To enter the crane stand on the ground beside it and press the Use button.
You can squash hunters by dropping the fridge on them using the Action button.
Take the gas can up the steps and press the Use button to refuel the crane.
Find some gas to get the crane working.
You need some gas to activate this crane.
Your next objective is shown on the radar as a green dot.
Clear the area of hunters to open the ~blue~gate
Find a way to lure out the hunter
Find the gasoline to fill the crane
Head back with the gasoline to refuel the crane
Use the crane to unblock the path
Hunt down the five hunters to open the ~blue~gate
Use the crane to unblock the path
Find the double doors to get to the exit

Don't let him outta here! Move it, move it!
What the - ? How many god damned times can a fuse blow?!
Aw that's just frickin' great - the fuse has fried again!
These Skinz are boring me - dumb-assed supremacist bastards.
Always blaming others for their inadequacies.
Butcher them, Cash. Cut'em up, beat 'em down and choke the fucking life out of them!

Restore power to the rails so that the last train can leave the station
Get onto the last train before the police order its departure

Old rusty locks like this can be broken with a well placed bullet.
We are under fire! Secure the station - repeat - secure the station !!
Roger - we are at the station.
This is Adam11 - we've located the suspect! Send in reinforcements, now!

Officers down! We need to seal this place right now!

Roger Alpha team, Charlie is en route from the precinct as we speak.

<radio static> sure you will never get out of that subway alive <radio static>

THIS IS BRAVO LEADER, TARGET SIGHTED! ZERO IN MY POSITION!

Dont know, but they are sending cops at all terminals...hope we dont meet the guy.
We are under fire! Secure the station - repeat - secure the station!

Roger TEAM1, Bravo team is moving in to your position

This is dispatch - we have a code 11 - Fugitive is presumed to be heading your way
We have a situation - Fugitive has reconnected power to the rails - repeat POWER IS ON.
Move that fucking train out of there!!
COP : JUST KEEP YOUR EYES PEELED HES AROUND HERE SOMEWHERE, WEVE GOT THE ACCESS TO THE TRACK LOCKED

Make your way to the end of the Trainyard

He is armed and is considered to be highly dangerous!
Freeze Punk! Just give me an excuse to waste you.

To jump from wagon to wagon and over big gaps, run as fast as you can towards the edge and the player will jump automatically.
To jump from roof to roof and over big gaps, run as fast as you can towards the edge and the player will jump automatically.
To open this door you need to find something to rip off its lock.
Watch out for hunters hiding in the shadows. They will not appear on the radar until you spot them.

Cash, baby, you're scaring the shit out of these Hoods. They're trying to bug out!
I can see their van coming, should be here in ten minutes or so.
Fucking low-life cowards... Do me a favour, kill every last one of them!
Well that's it! That wasn't too bad, was it? Head on over to that gate and I'll let you out�
Oh, for christ's sake, Cash, you blew it! It's the cutting room floor for you!
Cash, my man, you scared the shit out of the HOODS. They dont want to play with us anymore.
It will take 10 minutes for their VAN to arrive. Do me a favour and kill EVERYONE, Ok?
Well done Cash, the Hoods have been wiped out and the gates are open. Make your way towards them and Ill let you go.
You've been tranquilized, while in this state you won't be able to use the crowbar, wait until the effects have worn off.
Hold down the Action2 button to use the scope. You can zoom in and out using the movement buttons on the keyboard.
Find a weapon and get past the ~blue~rope-tied ~colour~door

Make your way to the zoo pens
These pricks call themselves the Wardogs - real dickless gung-ho losers
You're gonna have to tool up if you're gonna make it - take it slow and see what you can take from these guys.
There are some doors over the otherside of this location that will get your sorry hide out of here.
Where did I hide that crowbar? Think, think, think!
Sorry Cash, this is a grizzly situation...
Oh hell, that wasn't in the script! Honest Cash, they're making it up as they're going along, I swear!
Give him the fucking food, enough bullshitting.
Ah fuck! This guy fucking stinks!
Just give him the fucking food and let's get the hell out of here.
At ease. It's time to get out there and nail that bastard!
Jesus Christ! Come on, give this stinking guy his food.
Director : These pricks will kill you in a second if you're unarmed. Find an Executor and steal his weapon.

Kill the two hunters to open this door.
Kill the last hunter to open this door.
There are still hostages alive to rescue, go back and find them.
Save at least one of the four family members
Find your sister to open the door
Find the switch to open the exit door
Run as far away as you can!
Don't stop until you're out of here!
Hold up Cash. You and your family weren't exactly close, am I right?
It's just that I thought it would be nice to have a surprise reunion!
But, these Wardogs didn't see it my way and they've taken matters into their own hands.
They're using them as bait, Cash, bait. I know,
I know, I can hardly believe it myself.
Each time they spot you, these Wardogs are gonna execute one of your beloved family.
I like my leading men to have a soul, Cash, and that means 'giving a shit'.
So I'm not letting you out of here unless you free at least ONE of them.
Guess what you have to do to open the shark's mouth? Go rescue your family!
Now Cash; you've killed a few people in your time
don't be responsible for your whole family as well!
Too slow, Cash, they've nailed him!
Saw you, killed him! Life's a bitch.
Shit, you blew it! And now she pays the price.
You as good as killed her yourself!
Well, one out of four ain't too bad I suppose.
Two dead, two alive. Fifty, fifty.
Half a family. Good enough for me, though!
What a bummer, you turn up alive and one o'them kicks it.
You rescued them all! I knew I'd bring the hero out in you!
Ok, you can go through the shark's mouth now.
You just won't fucking die will you?
Director : We captured your family. If your seen by one of the hunters guarding a hostage, he'll execute the hostage.
Director : Rescue your family before the wardogs get too excited.
Director : Ok Cash, there's still one of your sisters hostage in the monkey dome.
Director : Find her, and I'll open this door.
Director : You failed to rescue a hostage Cash, now it's over for you.
Director : Say a prayer for your brother Cash.
Director : Be more careful Cash, try not to get spotted.
Director : Another body bag, alright Cash the door is open now.
Director : Nice going, alright Cash the door is open now.
Director : Get with it Cash, Your running out of family members.
Director : Well, one out of four ain't too bad I suppose. I've opened the gate...
Director : Two dead, two alive. Fifty, fifty. Half a family. Good enough for me, though!
Director : What a bummer, you turn up alive and one o'them kicks it. The gate's open.

When you fall from a height you will make noise that attracts hunters.
Press the Use button to kick this trashcan and use it as a lure for hunters.
To strafe against a wall, position the character against it and press the Use button.
Then press Left or Right on the keyboard to slide against the wall. Reach a corner and continue to press the button in the same direction to lean out and peek.
You can hit the wall to lure hunters by pressing the Action button. To detach from the wall, press the Use button or Down on the keyboard.
Bricks and all other lures are ~yellow~YELLOW ~colour~items and can be thrown to make noise and attract hunters.
To throw the brick, hold down the Action button. The longer you hold, the further away the object will be thrown. When you release the Action button, you will throw the object.
Big weapons like this Baseball Bat are ~red~RED ~colour~items. They are stronger, but not as fast as the lighter weapons.
You're doing great, kid. Grade A stuff.
Now find your way to the cellar door.
Alright, get him out of here.
Director : Your doing real good Cash!, It's almost over. This is the entrance to the cellar find it.
Use the CROWBAR to break the ~blue~PADLOCK~colour~
Win the fight in the cellar
Head through the buildings to get to the library
Go through the cellar to the exit
You can look behind you by pressing down the Look Back button.
One handed weapons like the Bat are ~blue~Blue ~colour~Objects. They are not lost after use but make noise during executions.
You can select individual weapons using the four Inventory Item buttons, or cycle through them with the Inventory button.
Hold down the First Person button to view your surroundings. You can use this to spot hunters at a distance.
Select the crowbar then press the Use button to break the padlock.
Press the Action and the Action2 buttons together to grapple. Time the attack right and you can chain 3 hits together.
To break free from a hunter's grapple press the Action button repeatedly.
The bigger weapons are stronger but not as fast as the lighter weapons like the crowbar.
The Crowbar can be used to break padlocks and other locked objects.
Walking on gravel will make noise that attracts the hunters.
Big weapons like this Baseball Bat are ~red~RED ~colour~items. They are stronger, but not as fast as the lighter weapons.
Special Windows like this one can be smashed. They will create a glass shard for you to collect.
Objectives are shown as a dot on the radar.
